attributes.action: Amend the application forms “Form 648” and “Form 101” that are related to  Fire Arm Certificate license grants found at the website address
attributes.additional_details:
Remove from Form 646 and Form 101

“11  Occupation”
On grounds that the applicant’s professional occupation is of no importance to the keeping of license regulated property.

“15a ‘Do you suffer from any medical condition or disability including alcohol and drug related conditions?’”
“15b ‘Have you now, or have you ever had Epilepsy?’”
“15c ‘Have you ever attended your present or a previous General
Practitioner (GP) for treatment of depression or any other kind of
mental or nervous disorder?’”
“16   Please give details of your current GP
Name of GP “
On grounds that the applicants medical history is to be classified strictly as private information only to be exchanged between confidential trustee‘s when concerning the individuals health care needs. Such data should be protected from unwarranted investigation by the Data Protection Act 1998.
